item.title: Minecraft Education launches replica of St. Peter’s Basilica in the Vatican
item.description: Students can step inside this legendary St. Peter's Basilica building and take on the role of its caretakers in Minecraft Education.

item.title: Operative Games unveils AI-driven interactive storytelling platform
item.description: Operative Games, an interactive storytelling company, emerged today from stealth with backing from investors 1AM Gaming, Samsung Next, and LongJourney...

item.title: Baidu delivers new LLMs ERNIE 4.5 and ERNIE X1 undercutting DeepSeek, OpenAI on cost — but they’re not open source (yet)
item.description: Baidu has also announced plans to integrate ERNIE 4.5 and ERNIE X1 into its broader ecosystem, including Baidu Search and the Wenxiaoyan app.

item.title: Mistral AI drops new open-source model that outperforms GPT-4o Mini with fraction of parameters
item.description: France's Mistral AI launches efficient open-source model that outperforms Google and OpenAI offerings with just 24 billion parameters, challenging U.S...

item.title: Inworld AI showcases AI case studies as they move to production
item.description: While impressive in controlled demos, today's AI technologies expose critical limitations when transitioning to production-ready games.
